Comments_List: I learned about the rapidly growing field of environmental history as it relates specifically to Latin America.

Strengths--excellent readings, knowledgeable and multidisciplinary students in the course, knowledgeable and engaged professors
Weaknesses--student presentations should be shorter, reading list could be shortened so that more people reading the same works.

Absolutely. The mixture of students and the co-teaching dynamic made for a really interesting discussion each week. I also appreciated having forestry and history students in the same room discussing themes. I learned a lot from my colleagues at FES.
